text:
#Niagara Public Health is getting ready to open another mass vaccination site. The MacBain community centre in Niagara Falls has been re-purposed, because of its size and ideal location right off the QEW. @botelhok reports. #vaccine #COVID19 

WATCH: https://t.co/y9AiIGozEG https://t.co/XXH9fmGqBI
